import React, { useState } from 'react'; const sections = [ { title: 'General Users', icon: 'üßæ', color: 'bg-blue-100 text-blue-700', content: (
‚úÖ Anonymous Reporting
You can report without revealing your identity. We respect anonymity.
‚úÖ Authentic Information
Share only real, verified, and observed information.
Do not share rumors or assumptions.
‚úÖ What to Include in a Report:
  • üìçLocation: Auto/manual (GPS-based or typed).
  • üïíDate & Time: Auto/manual.
  • üìùBrief Description: What exactly you saw or noticed.
  • üì∏Upload Image: Only if it's ethical, safe, and necessary.
‚úÖ SOS Button Use
Use only in true emergencies (e.g., discovered a body, legal urgency, etc.)
‚ùå You Must NOT:
  • Post fake, misleading, or duplicate reports.
  • Use platform for personal revenge, trolling, or harassment.
  • Attempt to mislead authorities using false data.
  • Upload graphic or violent images unnecessarily.
  • Abuse the system for defamation or illegal activity.
) }, { title: 'Health Workers / NGO Representatives', icon: 'üë©‚Äç‚öï', color: 'bg-green-100 text-green-700', content: (
‚úÖ You Must:
  • Upload incident details truthfully.
  • Confirm report before submitting with your org ID (if available).
  • Mention if you've already contacted police or municipal authorities.
‚úÖ Responsibilities Include:
  • Preserving dignity in handling remains.
  • Coordinating with local departments (police, hospital, municipality).
  • Ensuring no legal or ethical violations.
) }, { title: 'Police / Authorities', icon: 'üïµ', color: 'bg-purple-100 text-purple-700', content: (
‚úÖ You Should:
  • Review UID-linked case reports.
  • Update investigation progress through secure admin panel.
  • Mark cases "Under Review," "Claimed," or "Closed."
) }, { title: 'Emotional & Sensitive Content Policy', icon: 'üß†', color: 'bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-700', content: (
This platform deals with deceased individuals. Always maintain respectful language.
Refrain from posting graphic descriptions unless required.
Reports are monitored and moderated for ethical compliance.
) }, { title: 'Legal & Traceability Notice', icon: '‚ö†', color: 'bg-red-100 text-red-700', content: (
All reports are timestamped and traceable via UID, even if submitted anonymously.
Misuse may result in permanent ban or legal action.
) }, { title: 'Need Support?', icon: 'üì¨', color: 'bg-blue-100 text-blue-700', content: (
If you're unsure about submitting a report or have a concern:
üì© Email: support@avyakta.org
üí¨ Chat: Use the "Chat With Us" button
üìû 24/7 Helpline: 1800-XXX-XXXX
) } ]; export default function Guidelines() { const [open, setOpen] = useState([true, false, false, false, false, false]); const [accepted, setAccepted] = useState(false); const handleAccordion = idx => { setOpen(prev => prev.map((v, i) => (i === idx ? !v : v))); }; return (
{/* Intro Section */}

Avyakta Guidelines

Your Responsibility. Their Dignity.
This is not a casual reporting site. Every action here can affect real investigations and human dignity. Please read and follow these guidelines carefully.
{/* Guidelines Sections */}
{sections.map((section, idx) => (
{section.content}
))}
{/* Accept & Continue */}
{/* Animations */}
); }
